content: That sounds like a great plan! I'm thinking of personalizing the flower crowns by using flowers in pastel shades to match the Enchanted Garden theme. Do you think that's a good idea? And by the way, speaking of baby showers, I helped plan a surprise baby shower for my best friend Emily last month on February 1st, and we had so much fun with the games and decorations. I'm hoping to recreate some of that magic at this shower too.
